function.name: setprogress
function.description: Passes a progress indication to the system so that it can be displayed to the enduser through the user interface.The option progress should be a number between 0 and total. Total defaults to 1. If progress is larger than total, or if either option is negative, a progress of 100% will be set.Optionally, a message can be provided that will be displayed in front of the progress bar.
